page.title: 05LEATON KNOLLS CONT'D.
page.content: {LEATON KNOLLS}_ FARMING Cross Green and Leaton Knolls are mainly grassland areas,used for grazing and rough grazing as well as fields to cut for hay.Crops in this area are fodder beet,winter wheat,winter barley and spring barley.Land around the fields is mainly covered with bands of mixed woodland. Most of the field boundaries are hedges or barbed wire,with some metal and wooden fencing aling the main road.The land appears to be hilly in places for farming,but Fresian dairy cows are the most common animals seen in the farms of Leaton Knolls.
